name: Along Came a Slime - Demo
description:
Setting

You are a man eating slime that manages to escape into the sewers. You begin to understand and think for yourself and must uncover the reason for your creation. Along the way you meet other slimes that will assist you and fight off your creator creation.

Controls: Requires Mouse and Keyboard to Play

  • Movement: W, A, S, D
  • Action: X
  • Volume and Sound: ESC Button
  • Mouse to Aim and Left Mouse Button to Shoot

To  use full screen, click on the lower right double arrow to capture your whole screen. Press Esc button to escape full screen
